description_html: Gradient and Grade, by Source One Exclusive is a type II contemporary design combined with an architectural flair. It’s large-scale ombré effect is the perfect digital alternative in a standard 54” vinyl wallcovering. Create your own custom look by choosing from the 5 Gradient ombré colorways and their 10 Grade coordinating colors. Simply put, Gradient and Grade can be specified to be installed reverse hang, non-reverse hang or railroaded for endless desired effects.
